text: The 1999 movie “Drop Dead Gorgeous” is offensive, for sure—but it is also hilarious, surprisingly tender, and lavishly, magnificently absurd, @jiatolentino writes. https://t.co/olyzhpl7tn

text: Right now, Joe Biden’s strategy of keeping the focus on President Trump and pitching a broad tent is working well, @JohnCassidy writes. https://t.co/OEFlECtnjJ

text: America's system of government, its stated values, and its claims to greatness are all under siege by a President who lacks the moral compass, self-doubt, and respect for historical norms that would restrain another leader, @JohnCassidy writes. https://t.co/PiW6mC1GNn
